ItemTooltips.bottle: Buy this with the first 600 gold you farmed, it will give you the regen you need at the early game, while improving your gank potential with runes.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: The best boots of choise for Queen, it gives you atk speed and stats. You can use it either INT or STR. But STR is best, since u need more HP than MP
ItemTooltips.null_talisman: Just something to make your last hitting better, while giving you a bit of MP.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: One of the best item in the game, will give you mana to spam your spells and the ability to shut down the enemy carry.
ItemTooltips.orchid: Really good cheap item, amazing for countering blinking - invisible - disabler heros, easy to build and good stats.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Good speed bonus, the disable helps your team alot, and may save you many times, since you can use it on yourself and wait the blink CD.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: It`s good when the enemy team has a Riki, allows you to get out of his smoke fast, so you can blink.
ItemTooltips.dagon: One item for-fun only, gives you nice INT and 400 magical damage, giving you the pontential to kill the enemys in one combo.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: Really good item, gives you STR and INT, and the abillity to summon 2 demons. Amazing when fighting versus invisible heroes, or mana-dependent heroes.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Gives you nice mana and hp, also status and improves your ult, do it if the enemy team have alot of gold bags, but its also good to push
ItemTooltips.refresher: Some people like it. You can get this if you are playing a heavy-caster role, with Scepter and Veil.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Amazing item, allow you to do the massive AoE damage you should do in a team fight. Also good HP and damage.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: More AoE damage, slow, armor and INT. Great item if the enemy team has alot of physical damage.
ItemTooltips.bloodstone: I don`t like this item on Queen, but gives you alot of HP-MP and regen.
ItemTooltips.sphere: A really situational item, you can build it before Scyte, gives you good stats, good MP HP regen, and blocks one single-target spells.
ItemTooltips.rapier: Good if you are not dying much, do it as last item, when you need to destroy the enemy base fast.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: When you need some damage. Also counter evasion, perfect late-game item when your enemy may have Butterfly.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: If you wanted to go for Queen of Carry build, this is a amazing item, when you already have 2-3 dps items.
ItemTooltips.manta: It`s good vs silencers, but BKB is better.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: You can get this item for carry games since it stack with desolator now. Gives you more AoE damage and good ATK SPD.
ItemTooltips.skadi: Late-game item, amazing stats, and the passive slow is also really good, but not needed since you already got Shadow Strike.
ItemTooltips.desolator: For me, the start of Queen of Carry build, enjoy whipping the enemy supports ass.
ItemTooltips.ethereal_blade: Another for-fun item, allow you to burst down 1 enemy really fast, also you can use it to save an ally.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: Just do it if your team have alot of AoE spells, like Epicenter.

AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_shadow_strike: Your main tool to harass, constant damage and avarage slow, good to prevent the enemy from using bottle-salve for some time. Some people puts 2 points in this skill at lv 3, its good to harass meele heros, but not needed.
AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_blink: Get this at lv 1, so you can escape a possible gank.
AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_scream_of_pain: Your main skill. Dont use it if its not lv 3 or 4, its not worty it. Use it to harass when you get lv 5, but make sure you will get at least 2 lh too. Use to push the lane, so you can go grab the rune.
AbilityTooltips.queenofpain_sonic_wave: Your final skill, alot of AoE damage, with a big CD and mana cost. Use this to finish an enemy, or to initiate, but try to hit at least 2 enemys. If you build a Aghanim`s, you can use this to push, since it will kill all the creeps, and will have a 40 seconds CD.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Everybody love stats, so get yours here, it`s FREE!
